title: We Hates Them (7U77)
text:
Set:	The Return of the King
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gollum
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Bearer must be Smeagol. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to Smeagol.' Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion and play a companion from your discard pile.
Rarity:	U
